video_prompt: Woman's hand subtly shifts on her lap, head gently tilts. Water ripples subtly around her partially submerged foot. Ethereal fabric drapes and shifts around her. Distant background elements faintly move, reflecting the tranquil flow of water.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Serene digital painting of a fair-skinned woman with white hair, in flowing white garments, seated on a mossy rock at the edge of a dark, calm body of water in a forested landscape. Her bare right foot creates ripples in the water. She gazes away thoughtfully. Ornate golden staff partially obscured beside her. Soft, diffused lighting, contemplative, mystical, fantasy art.
refined_video_prompt: Her hand subtly shifts on her lap; her head gently tilts. Water softly ripples around her partially submerged foot. Ethereal fabric billows and undulates around her. Distant background elements faintly sway, mirroring the tranquil flow of water.
